amendment.description: Amendment created a National Tunnel Inspection Program that would establish national tunnel inspection standards and ensure uniformity among the States in the conduct of such inspections.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in part B of House Report 110-760 to create a National Tunnel Inspection Program that would establish national tunnel inspection standards and ensure uniformity among the States in the conduct of such inspections.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Oberstar amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
